Article: The genomic landscape of sensitivity to arsenic trioxide uncovered by genome-wide CRISPR-Cas9 screening.
Sample:

|    | 0        | 1         | 2           | 3        | 4        | 5             | 6       |
|---:|:---------|:----------|:------------|:---------|:---------|:--------------|:--------|
|  0 | id       | pos|score | pos|p-value | pos|fdr  | pos|rank | pos|goodsgrna | pos|lfc |
|  1 | KEAP1    | 2.87e-10  | 2.59e-07    | 0.002475 | 1        | 3             | 10.566  |
|  2 | C19orf43 | 9.42e-07  | 2.85e-06    | 0.018152 | 2        | 3             | 8.7163  |
|  3 | PIGA     | 2.12e-05  | 7.56e-05    | 0.294554 | 3        | 2             | 4.5552  |
|  4 | BBC3     | 2.24e-05  | 8e-05       | 0.294554 | 4        | 4             | 7.5085  |
|  5 | PRKCSH   | 2.64e-05  | 9.25e-05    | 0.294554 | 5        | 2             | 1.8063  |

Hint: this is what MAGeCK statistics look like. Generally in the form '[pos/neg]|[summary statistic]' e.g. pos|p-value, neg|goodsgrna,  pos|lfc, etc.
